channel.title: [508] When Buying with a Different Currency changing "Not enough coins" [508]
channel.description:
Well, I made a new shop but you need a different currency to buy the items with. How do i change the "You don't have enough coins" string in shopbuyconfig.java when using this shop?
If anyone can help me, I will Rep++

item.title: [508] When Buying with a Different Currency changing "Not enough coins" [508]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

else if (p.shopid == 12 && p.pkpoints >= p.shop12p[itemSlot]) { p.pkpoints -= p.shop12p[itemSlot]; pi.addItem(p, p.shop12[itemSlot], 1); } else { p.frames.sendMessage(p,"You don't have enough pk points!"); }

item.title: [508] When Buying with a Different Currency changing "Not enough coins" [508]
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

I’m using Bulby, Bulby doesn’t got ShopHandler.java. It’s ShopBuyConfig.java but I don’t know what I’m doing wrong.

else if (p.shopid == 12 && Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 995, p.shop12p[itemSlot])) { pi.deleteItem(p, 995, pi.getItemSlot(p, 995), p.shop12p[itemSlot]); pi.addItem(p, p.shop12[itemSlot], 1); } else { p.frames.sendMessage(p,"You don't have enough coins."); } That’s for coins. What would I do to make it change for a different item? I tried a few things, nothing worked.

Read full topic

Search you don not have enough coins. (I think, depends on you base)
